backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles with Pro subscription tracking, game management (CRUD operations), access control with role-based permissions, blob storage mixin, and Stripe payment integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the Pro upgrade CTA text change from 'Please log in to upgrade' to 'Pay $20 to upgrade' in ProFeaturesModal and ProUpgrade components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including styling (gold-themed OKLCH colors), routing (TanStack Router with Pro upgrade routes), components (Header, ChatView, MathProblemSolver, MediaDisplay, TranslatorChat), and hooks (chat sessions, media generation with Canvas API, translation).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, Apple mobile web app configuration, PWA manifest link, canonical URL, and JSON-LD structured data for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme OKLCH colors, sticky header with tab navigation, card-based layout, and fade-in animations for tab content switching.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata including name, description, standalone display mode, black theme color, and icon assets at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing nine URLs (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and weekly change frequency for SEO indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with all route definitions (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games, payments, etc.), and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, and AI art idea generator chat; supports saving artwork as PNG and sharing with generated URLs.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat page layout that combines ChatSidebar and ChatView components, handles session selection via URL params, and provides a collapsible sidebar with close button.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection; shows loading states and formats relative timestamps (e.g., '5m ago').
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface displaying message history with user/assistant avatars, textarea input with Enter-to-send, simulated typing delays, and contextual AI response generation using conversation history.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches rendering errors and displays a styled error card with error details, retry button, and page reload option.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games. Supports game deletion for owners and opens GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Routes user to appropriate view based on selection.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Embeds and plays games in an iframe, supporting both predefined templates (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, etc.) and user-created games. Tracks scores via postMessage and updates high scores on the backend.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Form-based game creation interface where authenticated users can input title, description, and HTML/CSS/JavaScript code to create and save new games.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games section router that manages view state (menu/browse/create/playing) and coordinates between GameBrowser, GameStudio, GamePlayer, and PredefinedGameSelector components.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component with logo, theme toggle, authentication status, user profile display with Pro badge, and navigation buttons (home, sign out, upgrade to Pro).
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a grid of navigation cards for different AI features (Math Solver, Chat, Translator, Code, Music, Art, Media, Games) with a Pro upgrade button and admin payment setup section.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with expression evaluation, step-by-step solutions, difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, and homework helper mode with chat-like interface.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media search interface with tabs for images and videos, featuring auto-search functionality, image downloads, video playback dialog, and integration with web search APIs.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component supporting AI-generated audio from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with kick/snare/hihat sounds, tempo control, playback, and sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Payment cancellation page displaying error state with explanatory message and action buttons to return home or retry the Pro upgrade purchase.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSetup.tsx: Admin component for configuring Stripe payment integration with secret key input, allowed countries configuration, and status display showing whether Stripe is configured.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Success page displayed after completing a Pro subscription payment, showing confirmation message, Pro feature list, and navigation buttons to home or chat.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Modal dialog displaying a grid of predefined games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, etc.) with Pro-only games locked behind subscription, allowing users to select and launch games.
frontend/src/components/ProFeaturesModal: Modal showcasing Pro subscription features with pricing ($20 USD one-time), feature list, and checkout button that initiates Stripe payment flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: First-time user onboarding dialog that prompts for name input and creates initial user profile with default values (0 games played, no Pro subscription).
frontend/src/components/ProUpgrade.tsx: Full-page Pro upgrade view displaying detailed feature cards (AI chat, 3D games, art generation, etc.) with pricing and checkout integration for purchasing Pro subscription.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component that provides a chat-based interface for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with features for copying generated code and message history.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, handling loading states, errors, and rendering appropriate media players or image viewers.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation interface component supporting 12 languages with language selection dropdowns, translation history, and real-time text translation functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages Internet Computer actor creation with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates creative art prompts based on user input keywords, providing randomized suggestions across categories like animals, landscapes, abstract, fantasy, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork with mutation handling and URL generation, though backend artwork sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on text prompts and converting them to WAV format for playback and download.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, erasing, brush size/color control, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions stored in localStorage with React Query, providing CRUD operations for sessions and messages, plus an AI response generator that handles greetings, math, science, and history questions with contextual responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: React Query mutation hook for creating Stripe checkout sessions via the backend actor, accepting shopping items and returning a checkout session with redirect URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games (get all, get single, create, delete) via the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query hooks for retrieving and updating high scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageSearch.ts: Hook for searching images using the free Unsplash Source API without authentication, generating 12 unique image results per search query with different random seeds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Hook for generating images and videos from text prompts with sophisticated prompt analysis that extracts colors, shapes, subjects, actions, settings, emotions, and animation properties to guide procedural generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: React hook for sharing music that generates local music IDs and provides clipboard copy functionality, though backend music sharing is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: React hook that manages AI script generation with mock responses for various programming languages (React, Python, JavaScript, API calls, calculator) based on user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content, both currently throwing errors as backend sharing is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: React hook providing mock translation functionality with simulated API delays and hardcoded translations for common phrases in multiple languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the actor backend, with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSearch.ts: React hook providing video search functionality with a curated database of free sample videos organized by categories (nature, animals, technology, sports, etc.) with keyword matching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom gold-themed color variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar styling and background image setup.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
HTML template string containing a complete Breakout game implementation with canvas rendering, brick collision detection, paddle controls, and scoring system.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Exports a complete HTML template for a Flappy Bird game with bird sprite, pipe obstacles, scoring system, gravity physics, and collision detection.
Exports a complete HTML template for a Fortnite-style shooter game with enemies, teammates, health system, level progression, and a shop panel for purchasing weapons and upgrades.
frontend/src/templates/minecraftTemplate: Exports a complete HTML template for a Minecraft-style block mining game with a grid-based world, different block types (grass, dirt, stone, wood, diamond), player movement, and resource collection.
frontend/src/templates/pongTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template for a Pong game with player paddle, AI opponent, ball physics, collision detection, and score tracking to 10 points.
frontend/src/templates/robloxTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template for a Roblox-style platformer game with player character, platforms, coin collection, jumping mechanics, and gravity physics.
frontend/src/templates/snakeTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template string for a Snake game with canvas rendering, keyboard/touch controls, scoring, game over screen, and start prompt animation.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Implements an ErrorLogger class that captures, stores, and outputs log entries with different severity levels (info, warning, error, critical) to console and maintains a rolling buffer of recent logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and methods to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties including sidebar colors, chart colors, custom shadows, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file tracking schema version, existing features, feature requests, and a pending change to update Pro upgrade call-to-action text from 'Please log in to upgrade' to 'Pay $20 to upgrade'.
